TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class SqlCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调通过关联的 SQL Server 数据库对 所做更改的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会自动生成所需协调对所做更改的 TRANSACT-SQL 语句与关联的 SQL Server 实例。The does not automatically generate the Transact-SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated instance of SQL Server. 但是，可以创建对象来自动生成的单表更新 TRANSACT-SQL 语句，如果您设置属性的。However, you can create a object to automatically generate Transact-SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后，将不设置任何其他 TRANSACT-SQL 语句生成的。Then, any additional Transact-SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 将自身注册为侦听器事件何时设置属性。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 您可以仅将相关联或与每个其他对象一次。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句使用要自动检索一组元数据的属性。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果您更改已检索了的元数据，如第一次更新，应调用后方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 还必须至少返回一个主键或唯一列。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果不存在，任何**InvalidOperation**则会生成异常，并且不会生成命令。If none are present, an **InvalidOperation** exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 还使用， ，和属性引用的。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 用户应调用如果修改一个或多个这些属性，或如果本身将被替换。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则为， ，和属性保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您调用，则会与其，并且无法再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用，以及和，以从数据源选择的行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例连接字符串、 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串和为数据库表的名称的字符串传递。The example is passed a connection string, a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the database table. 然后该示例创建。The example then creates a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/CS/Source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/VB/Source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As SqlCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DeriveParameters` 将覆盖任何现有参数信息`SqlDbCommand`。`DeriveParameters` overwrites any existing parameter information for the `SqlDbCommand`. `DeriveParameters` 需要额外调用数据库中获取信息。`DeriveParameters` requires an additional call to the database to obtain the information. 如果在提前知道参数信息，则更有效地通过显式设置的信息填充的参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用`DeriveParameters`的存储过程。You can only use `DeriveParameters` with stored procedures. 不能使用`DeriveParameters`与扩展存储过程。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` with extended stored procedures. 不能使用`DeriveParameters`填充使用任意 Transact SQL 语句，如参数化 SELECT 语句。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 此命令文本不是一个有效的存储过程名。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首先生成的 SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetDeleteCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetDeleteCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成与列名匹配的参数名（如果可能）。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

span.span: If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首先生成的 SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时的默认行为是使用@p1， @p2，为各种参数，依此类推。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 传递`true`有关`useColumnsForParameterNames`参数允许你强制生成改为基于列名称的参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作将成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合，其长度为等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称符合中指定的条件从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到集合正则表达式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - 一个从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行插入操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object that is required to perform insertions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次生成 TRANSACT-SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. TRANSACT-SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

TRANSACT-SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时的默认行为是使用@p1， @p2，为各种参数，依此类推。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 传递`true`有关`useColumnsForParameterNames`参数允许你强制生成改为基于列名称的参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作将成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合，其长度为等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称符合中指定的条件从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到集合正则表达式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - 一个从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行更新操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次生成 TRANSACT-SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. TRANSACT-SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行更新所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次生成 TRANSACT-SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. TRANSACT-SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

Public Function GetUpdateCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成与列名匹配的参数名（如果可能）。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

span.span: If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行更新操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行更新所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次生成 TRANSACT-SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. TRANSACT-SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时的默认行为是使用@p1， @p2，为各种参数，依此类推。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 传递`true`有关`useColumnsForParameterNames`参数允许你强制生成改为基于列名称的参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作将成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合，其长度为等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称符合中指定的条件从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到集合正则表达式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - 一个从返回**GetSchema**方法调用，并在找到指定集合。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.

summary.span: 获取或设置在指定其名称中包含空格或保留标记等字符的 SQL Server 数据库对象（如表或列）时使用的一个或多个起始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.

value.span: 要使用的一个或多个起始字符。

span.span: The starting character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 虽然不能更改或属性后插入、 更新或删除生成命令，可以将其设置更改之后调用`Update`DataAdapter 方法。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 在生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE command has been generated.

summary.span: 获取或设置在指定其名称中包含空格或保留标记等字符的 SQL Server 数据库对象（如表或列）时使用的一个或多个结束字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The ending character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 虽然不能更改或属性后插入、 更新或删除操作已生成，可以将其设置更改之后调用`Update`DataAdapter 方法。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete operation has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 当生成 Insert、Update 或 Delete 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshSchema() cil managed
public override string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作架构标识符和任何其他标识符之间的分隔符的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 要用作架构分隔符的字符。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，数据库服务器中使用某些字符的标识符分隔的架构名称来指示标识符的架构。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用一段时间，创建完整的标识符，例如 Person.CustomerName，其中"Person"是架构名称，"CustomerName"是的标识符。For example, SQL Server uses a period, creating complete identifiers such as Person.CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 修改此行为的开发人员可以将此属性设置。Setting this property lets developers modify this behavior.

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.
